comments: Asymptotic expansion (below) converge much faster if n is odd. If n is even, then more than 1000 terms necessary for right numerical verification. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2013
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: E.g.f.: (x+sqrt(1+x^2))*exp(tanh(x)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2013a(n) ~ -2*cos(Pi*n/2-tan(1)) * n^(n-1) / exp(n). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
